roasts.name: Tin Lizzie Espresso Blend
roasts.tasting_notes: Chocolate, chocolate, and chocolate. Heavy body, chewy coffee grounds flavor. Bullseye for my desired style of espresso. Forgiving across a range of extractions. Well balanced secondary flavors hididng beneath the chocolate. I dig it.

roasts.name: The South American Cold Breezy Blend
roasts.tasting_notes: Designed for cold brew, I used it for pourover drip. Tasty, balanced, chocolate and rounded sweetness. Like cold brew, but hot.
